skills.name: Absorb Mana
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and recovers the HP by 30% of the damage dealt. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +5%
Damage +10%

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skills.multiplier_formula: 1.8*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Block Flow
skills.description: Extends the time of the beneficial effects and shortens the time of the harmful effects and recovers the HP of all allies. The recovery amount is in proportion to the Attack Power.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Decrease Debuff Duration
skill_effect.description: Decreases the duration of debuffs by a number of turns.

skill_effect.name: Increase Buff Duration
skill_effect.description: Increases the duration of a buff by a number of turns.

skills.name: Soul Revival
skills.description: Revives an ally with 25% of HP and recovers the ally's HP by 15% each turn for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: Recovery
skill_effect.description: 15% of max HP is healed for every turn this is active
